alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Montgomery; Northern Fulton; Northern Herkimer; Southern Fulton; Southern Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 1:42AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Hamilton, western Fulton, Herkimer and northwestern Montgomery Counties through 245 AM EDT... At 141 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near McKeever to near Edmeston. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ilion, Herkimer, Little Falls, Old Forge, Mohawk, Frankfort, Dolgeville, St. Johnsville, Ohio, West Winfield, Newport, Stratford, Middleville, Poland, Inlet, Cold Brook, Jordanville, Brown Tract Pond Campground, Eighth Lake Campground and Nicks Lake Campground. This includes Interstate 90 between exits 29A and 30. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until these storms pass.

area.areaDesc: Hamilton; Montgomery; Northern Fulton; Northern Herkimer; Southern Fulton; Southern Herkimer
